name: Water Reminder - Remind Drink Water
description:
Water Reminder - Remind drink water is a simple reminder app that helps you drink enough water. It reminds you to drink water at regular intervals during the day, which can help you stay healthy and lose weight. It also tracks your water intake, sets reminders on when and how much to drink.

Drink water app is all about staying hydrated. Drink enough water and live healthily!

Features:
- Water Reminder app reminds you to drink water during your whole day and keeps you hydrated.
- Based on gender, height & weight, weather conditions will let you know how much water should drink per day.
- Also, you can set manually drink water goal.
- Customizable water container setting with measure (fl oz) or metric (ml) units.
- Customized wake-up time and bedtime setting to drink water within a day.
- Records of daily water intake.
- Generate graph report based on a past date.
- Can set reminders automatic and manually.
- Can set an automatic reminder with wake-up time, bedtime and interval.
- Can set a manual reminder with a specific time on weekdays.

Drink water or risk health problems. Water Reminder is the ultimate smart reminder app that will help you stay in shape and keep fit.

Can also set reminders of how much to drink, so you do not forget! This application helps prevent kidney stones and helps you maintain a healthy routine. The app keeps you hydrated.

Water Reminder is a free, simple and effective tool to remind you to drink enough water, which helps in clearing up your skin and nails healthy. Reasons to use this app: - Timely reminders help you stay healthy and fit - The reminders are easy to understand and modify as per your need - You can easily track your daily water intake by logging the glasses poured. This app is one of the best daily water tracker reminders.
